experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Software developer skilled in front-end and back-end development. Able to build and manage the entire web application, working on the user interface (what users see) as well as the server, database, and application logic (what happens behind the scenes). Full-stack developers are versatile and can handle all aspects of web development, from design to deployment.As Full Stack Developer, I'm used to work with techonologies like Python ( Django, Flask ) C# (.NET, AngularJs) , the Power Platform stack and Cloud Developer Azure Tools ( Azure functions, Azure App Services, Azure SQL Server ,Azure CosmosDB ).I've docker knowledge for orchestrating deployments
